attributes.action: suspend foriegn aid to certain countries like India and use the money for flood relief victoms
attributes.additional_details: The South West of England and other areas which have been subjected to floods on a scale which is unsurpassed  will need financial assistance lasting years. Thousands of people and businesses face financial ruin, vast areas of land may never recover. The financial assistance currently being offered by the Government is a paltry sum when compared with the vast amount money which these areas need. The Foreign Aid to rich countries like India should be suspended and the money used to assist the rebuilding of the infrastructure in these areas and the lives of the inhabitants.
